text:
Tonie Marshall (November 29, 1951 – March 12, 2020) was a French-American actress, screenwriter, and director. She was born in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France. She was known for her role in "A Slightly Pregnant Man". She also directed "Venus Beauty Institute" and "The Missionaries".
Marshall died on March 12, 2020 after a long-illness in Paris, aged 68.
